verses.verse: By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2476>stand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> maketh not <S%G2617>ashamed;<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is shed <S%G1632>abroad<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> which is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G2254>us.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> will <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G599>die:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> <S%G5029>peradventure<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> a good <S%G18>man<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> would <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5111>dare<s%> to <S%G599>die.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if,<s%> when we <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> we were <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more,<s%> being <S%G2644>reconciled,<s%> we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam<s%> <S%G3360>to<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them that had not <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3667>similitude<s%> of <S%G76>Adam's<s%> <S%G3847>transgression,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5179>figure<s%> of <S%G3588>him<s%> that was to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3900>offense,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> free <S%G5486>gift.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> through <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3900>offense<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> hath <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4183>many.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it was <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> that <S%G264>sinned,<s%> so is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1434>gift:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> free <S%G5486>gift<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3900>offenses<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1345>justification.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> by one <S%G1520>man's<s%> <S%G3900>offense<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1520>one;<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> they which <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.)<s%>

Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3900>offense<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> judgment came <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation;<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> the free gift came <S%G1519>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1347>justification<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>
